mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
INSERT INTO equipment_lease (id, student_id, equipment_id, number, borrow_time, return_time, state) VALUES (#{id}, #{studentId}, #{equipmentId} , #{number}, #{borrowTime}, #{returnTime}, #{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE equipment_lease SET number = #{number}, borrow_time = #{borrowTime}, return_time = #{returnTime}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT equipment_lease.*, student.id s_id, student.name s_name, student.number s_number, equipment.id e_id, equipment.name e_name FROM equipment_lease LEFT OUTER JOIN student ON equipment_lease.student_id = student.id LEFT OUTER JOIN equipment ON equipment_lease.equipment_id = equipment.id ORDER BY (equipment.name + 0) ASC
